dcterms:creator: Raffaele Tito D’Agnolo
Gaia Grosso
Maurizio Pierini
Andrea Wulzer
Marco Zanetti
dcterms:description: A five-dimensional simulated dataset composed of simulated LHC collision events producing two muons in the final state pp → µ+µ−, at a center-of-mass energy of 13 TeV. It includes features such as transverse momenta and pseudorapidities of the two muons and their relative azimuthal angle.
dcterms:title: DIMUON

dcterms:creator: Pierre Baldi
Peter Sadowski
Daniel Whiteson
dcterms:description: A dataset composed of simulated LHC collision events in which the final state is made of two charged leptons and missing momentum, including the decay of a pair of electrically charged supersymmetric particles.
dcterms:title: SUSY

dcterms:creator: Pierre Baldi
Peter Sadowski
Daniel Whiteson
dcterms:description: A dataset made of simulated events in which the signal is given by the production of heavy Higgs bosons, with a final state consisting of a pair of vector bosons and two bottom quarks.
dcterms:title: HIGGS
